content: Register for the DISPERSE 2022 Conference on Eventbrite.

Are you ready to join other like-minded researchers and professionals at an interdisciplinary conference? Interested in developing new strategies and policies to mitigate weather-related risks and damages? The DISPERSE 2022 Conference is an ideal opportunity to network and expand your knowledge of the field.
We hope you will join us!
